item.title: Th' one an' only hidden child
item.description: Arrr! Pirrrates Fello' pirrates, be awarrre some stuff may not work fer us in this trrranslat'n. Like table of rrramblings, see'ng Merrrmaids, do'ng math or chemistrrry and stuff. Placeholder…
